226519.en:
Oh, no! Who are you? A thief!I won't forgive you if you touch anything in this house! What a horror! Someone,
get rid of this fellow!

226521.en:
Zechres Castle is always beautiful.It
is my daily routine to take a walk and
look around this beautiful country.

226523.en:
Haa... I see you're not home yet. You're not home yet, are you? The owner of this mansion went out to Astoltia and
never came back. His cold eyes and merciless tongue have completely stolen my heart. I want to be looked
into those beautiful red eyes again. I might as well chase after him and go to Astoltia too.

226525.en:
This is the residence of the Belastre house, the most prestigious noble family in Zechres. No unauthorized
persons are allowed to enter. Please leave.

226527.en:
...What the hell is wrong with you people? This is no place for strangers. You defile the house, you
will not be tolerated. Get the hell out of here!

226529.en:
Hmm... it's about time I got a new painting for this wall. As a man of wealth, I must always be in touch with
art. I'll spare no expense for a good painting. I hope there will never be another great artist like the Great
Demon King, who will move my heart.

226531.en:
The previous head of the Belastre house had business acumen. He increased the wealth of one of
Zechres' most famous families and made it prosperous, but he was always lenient with his daughters. Thanks to
him, Linberry is now so selfish that he is about to use up all the wealth he has amassed over the generations. I
hope someone will stop him.

226533.en:
You don't look like anyone I've seen around here.Are you a mouth trying to make a buck in this country? If you
want to make money, Farazard is much better. These Zechres are very wary of strangers, so it's hard for immigrants
to do business there.

226537.en:
I'm getting low on cash, so I'll have to go back to Six Continents Temple to sell some of Astoltia's wares. Thank
goodness we have a very generous owner. He's willing to pay a lot for anything from Astoltia, even if it's
junk that looks like trash to us.

226539.en:
...You look shabby.You lowlifes shouldn't be out around here. Most of you are here to steal, aren't you? If you
loiter any longer, I'll call the guards. What are you soldiers doing? What are you soldiers doing?

226541.en:
This is the area of Zechres where the aristocrats and the rich live, and I, a commoner, get nervous just by being
there. I wonder what kind of life the people who live in such big houses have? It's so far above my head that I
can't even imagine it.
226541.ja:
ã€Œã“ã®è¾ºã‚Šã¯ã€€ã‚¼ã‚¯ãƒ¬ã‚¹é­”å°å›½ã®ä¸­ã§ã‚‚ ã€€è²´æ—ã‚„ã€€ãŠé‡‘æŒã¡ãŒã€€ä½ã‚“ã§ã„ã‚‹å ´æ‰€ã ã‹ã‚‰ ã€€å¹³æ°‘ã®åƒ•ãªã‚“ã‹ã€€ã„ã‚‹ã ã‘ã§ç·Šå¼µã—ã¡ã‚ƒã†ã‚ˆã€‚

226543.en:
I came all the way from Farazard to do business here because I heard there were a lot of very rich aristocrats,
but I was wrong. They look down on us from the bottom of their hearts just because we're strangers here. I wonder
if I should go back to my country.
226543.ja:
ã€Œã“ã®å›½ã¯ã€€ã¨ã³ãã‚Šé‡‘æŒã¡ã®è²´æ—ãŒå¤šã„ã¨ ã€€èã„ãŸã‚“ã§ã€€å•†å£²ã™ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã«ã€€ãƒ•ã‚¡ãƒ©ã‚¶ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‹ã‚‰ ã€€ã¯ã‚‹ã°ã‚‹æ¥ãŸã‚“ã ãŒã€€å½“ã¦ãŒã¯ãšã‚Œã¡ã¾ã£ãŸã‚ˆã€‚

226545.en:
This is Zechres. This is the city of Zechres, where the oldest family in the Demon World, the Zechres kings,
have gathered to make it a magnificent city. You are not a resident of this land.Please behave yourself so as not
to disturb the high morals of this country.
226545.ja:
ã€Œã“ã“ã¯ã€€ã‚¼ã‚¯ãƒ¬ã‚¹é­”å°å›½ã ã€‚ ã€€é­”ç•Œã§æœ€ã‚‚æ­´å²ã‚ã‚‹ä¸€æ—ã€€ã‚¼ã‚¯ãƒ¬ã‚¹ç‹å®¶ã®ã‚‚ã¨ã« ã€€ç”±ç·’ã‚ã‚‹é­”æ—ãŸã¡ãŒé›†ã„ã—ã€€è¯éº—ãªã‚‹éƒ½ã ã€‚
ã€ŒãŠå‰ã¯ã€€ã“ã®å›½ã®ä½æ°‘ã§ã¯ãªã„ãªã€‚ ã€€æ ¼èª¿é«˜ãã€€ã“ã®å›½ã®ã€€é¢¨ç´€ã‚’ä¹±ã•ã¬ã‚ˆã† ã€€å¿ƒã—ã¦ã€€æŒ¯ã‚‹èˆã„ãŸã¾ãˆã‚ˆã€‚

226547.en:
Is this your first time at Zechres? I thought so because of your aboriginal atmosphere. How'd you guess? I've
lived here long enough to know.The inhabitants of this country have a grace that people from other countries
can't match.

226549.en:
Damn it, you aristocrats, just wait and see! I'm going to turn things around and build a big mansion in a
prime location! I'm going to get back at them for all the times they've looked down on me. I'm going to live
off the backs of all those pretentious people whose only advantage is their family backgrounds.

226551.en:
I've been invited to a friend's tea party, but I don't have any more dresses to wear. I'm too embarrassed
to wear the same dress all the time. It's a problem because there's a tea party every day at a mansion
somewhere. I'll have to go get a new dress made.

226553.en:
Have you ever seen the Demon KingAsbal who rules this country? He has a very delicate and beautiful face! Oh, it's
beautiful. As a commoner, I don't get many chances to see him, but I wonder if I can somehow get close to him.

226555.en:
This town is always so beautiful.It is the most historic city in the Demon World, unlike other barbaric
countries. Especially the beautiful Zechres Castle!The royal families who live there are also very beautiful and
make me proud to be a resident of this country!

226557.en:
There is a store called Six Continents Temple on the northern edge of town. The owner is a very generous guy, and
he'll pay good prices for Astoltia's goods. You're from out of town, aren't you?If you have any Astoltia items,
you should go there and sell them.

226559.en:
I haven't seen Master Asbal recently.His mother, Elgadora, seems to be in good health, but the
legitimate Demon King should be his son, Asbal. He doesn't appear at royal parties very often.

226561.en:
This country is racist, so even rich people like us, who look like monsters, can't become nobles. The
aristocrats of Zechres still believe that demons are more beautiful and superior. Outside, all kinds of people
are living free. That's why people like us who were born in this country often leave the country. When they
learn about the outside world, they think it's stupid to stay here.
226561.ja:
ã€Œã“ã®å›½ã¯ã€€å·®åˆ¥çš„ã ã‹ã‚‰ã€€ä¿ºã‚‰ã¿ãŸã„ãª ã€€è¦‹ã‚‹ã‹ã‚‰ã«é­”ç‰©ã£ã¦å§¿ã®ãƒ¤ãƒ„ã‚‰ã¯ ã€€ã©ã‚“ãªã«é‡‘æŒã¡ã§ã‚‚ã€€è²´æ—ã«ã¯ã€€ãªã‚Œã­ãˆã‚“ã ã€‚

226563.en:
The gate has been stubbornly closed. It looks like it has not been used for quite a long time because it is
covered with dust.

226569.en:
You're a stranger, aren't you?I recognized you at first sight because you were walking around the town like
a stranger.When you come to this country, you should see Zechres Castle first. It is the castle of Demon King
Asbal and his mother, Elgadora. If you want to go to Zechres Castle, just go straight down this main street.

226571.en:
The king of this kingdom is Demon KingAsbal, but for some reason, his mother, Elgadora, seems to stand out
more. She often holds tea parties and parties, and even I, a commoner, often see her mother, but her son never
appears at all. Well, this Elgadora is a cool woman who seems to have a lot of pride. Even I would feel
uncomfortable if I had a mother like that.
226571.ja:
ã€Œã“ã®å›½ã®ç‹ã¯ã€€é­”ç‹ã‚¢ã‚¹ãƒãƒ«ã£ã¦ãƒ¤ãƒ„ã ãŒ ã€€ã©ã†ã„ã†ã‚ã‘ã‹ã€€æ¯è¦ªã®ã‚¨ãƒ«ã‚¬ãƒ‰ãƒ¼ãƒ©ã®ã»ã†ãŒ ã€€ç›®ç«‹ã£ã¦ã‚‹æ°—ãŒã™ã‚‹ãªã€‚

ã€Œã¾ã‚ã€€ã“ã®ã‚¨ãƒ«ã‚¬ãƒ‰ãƒ¼ãƒ©ã£ã¦ã®ãŒã€€ã„ã‹ã«ã‚‚ ã€€ãƒ—ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒ‰ã®é«˜ãã†ãªã€€ã„ã‘å¥½ã‹ã­ãˆå¥³ã§ã‚ˆã‰ã€‚ ã€€ä¿ºã§ã‚‚ã€€è‡ªåˆ†ã®æ¯è¦ªãŒã‚ã‚ãªã‚‰ã€€æ°—å¾Œã‚Œã™ã‚‹ã­ã€‚

226573.en:
Welcome, traveler.There is nothing
here in Zechres that we merchants
can't buy! Take a look!<bw_break>

226575.en:
Hey, traveler! We're the only place you can stay in prestigious Zechres! No strangers allowed anywhere in this
country! Come on, you want to come by?
226575.ja:
ã€Œã‚ˆã‰ã€€æ—…äººã•ã‚“ï¼ã€€æ ¼å¼é«˜ã„ã€€ã‚¼ã‚¯ãƒ¬ã‚¹é­”å°å›½ã§ ã€€æ³Šã¾ã‚Œã‚‹å ´æ‰€ã¯ã€€ã†ã¡ã ã‘ã ã‚ˆï¼ã€€ã“ã®å›½ã˜ã‚ƒ ã€€ã©ã“ã‚‚ã€€ã‚ˆãè€…ã¯ã€€ãŠæ–­ã‚Šã ã‹ã‚‰ãªï¼
ã€Œã•ã‚ã€€å¯„ã£ã¦ãã‹ã„ï¼Ÿ

226577.en:
Be careful when walking through the dense Belvain Forest outside Zechres. It's a beautiful forest, but it's also
very dangerous. It used to be a beautiful, peaceful forest where silver-winged dragons would return to
rest their wings, but recently I've been hearing a lot of stories about attacks by hexenbiests. The number of
silver pterodactyls seems to have decreased a lot because of that evil beast, and I hope someone will be able
to slay it.
226577.ja:
ã€Œã‚¼ã‚¯ãƒ¬ã‚¹é­”å°å›½ã®å¤–ã«ã€€ã†ã£ãã†ã¨åºƒãŒã£ã¦ã‚‹ ã€€ãƒ™ãƒ«ãƒ´ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ³ã®æ£®ã‚’æ­©ãæ™‚ã¯ã€€æ³¨æ„ãŒå¿…è¦ã ã€‚ ã€€ç¾ã—ã„æ£®ã ãŒã€€å±é™ºã‚‚å¤šã„ã‹ã‚‰ãªã€‚
ã€Œæ˜”ã¯ã€€éŠ€ç¿¼ç«œãŒã€€ç¾½ã‚’ä¼‘ã‚ã«å¸°ã£ã¦ãã‚‹ ã€€å¹³å’Œã§ã€€ç¾ã—ã„æ£®ã ã£ãŸã‚“ã ãŒã€€ã“ã“ã®ã¨ã“ã‚ ã€€é­”ç£ã«è¥²ã‚ã‚ŒãŸã£ã¦è©±ã‚’ã€€ã‚ˆãèãã‚“ã ã€‚
ã€Œã‚ã®é­”ç£ã®ã›ã„ã§ã€€éŠ€ç¿¼ç«œã®æ•°ã‚‚ã€€ ã€€ã ã„ã¶ã€€æ¸›ã£ã¡ã¾ã£ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã¿ãŸã„ã ã—ã€€ ã€€èª°ã‹ãŒã€€å€’ã—ã¦ãã‚ŒãŸã‚‰ã„ã„ã‚“ã ãŒãªã€‚

226579.en:
The Zechres don't like strangers, so it's hard for us merchants to get in and out freely. But the trade-off is
that there are few rivals, so once you've earned their trust, you have a monopoly on their business. That's the
bad kunai.
226579.ja:
ã€Œã“ã®ã‚¼ã‚¯ãƒ¬ã‚¹é­”å°å›½ã¯ã€€ã‚ˆãè€…ã‚’å«Œã†ã‹ã‚‰ ã€€å•†äººã®ä¿ºã‚‰ã‚‚ã€€è‡ªç”±ã«ã€€å‡ºå…¥ã‚Šã§ãã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã« ã€€ãªã‚‹ã¾ã§ã€€ã²ã¨è‹¦åŠ´ãªã‚“ã ã‚ˆã€‚
ã€Œã ãŒã€€ãã®ã‹ã‚ã‚Šã€€ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒãƒ«ãŒå°‘ãªã„ã‹ã‚‰ ã€€ä¸€åº¦ã€€ä¿¡ç”¨ã‚’å‹ã¡å–ã£ã¡ã¾ãˆã° ã€€å•†å£²ã‚’ç‹¬å ã§ãã‚‹ã€‚ãã®ç‚¹ã¯ã€€æ‚ªããªã„ãªã€‚

226581.en:
When they go out, they wear a lot of jewelry and precious metals, so they're easy prey for passing by. But
these days, many of them have guards to protect them from thieves. If you get caught, you're finished, so you
have to be careful and do your job.

226583.en:
I heard that you are not on good terms
with His Majesty Asbal, but I wonder
if that's true.

226585.en:
I don't mean to belittle any emissaries from other countries, but right now, the search for Asbal-sama
is what's important. I will ask you to come back!

226587.en:
This is the castle of Demon King Asbal, the current head of Zechres, and Queen Elgadora, the Queen Mother!
Currently, King Asbal is not here. If you want an audience with the king, you'll have to come back another day!

226589.en:
Lately, Mr. Asbal seems to be sneaking out of the castle from time to time. It seems Master Elgadora is having a
hard time with it. A few soldiers came looking for him around here earlier, but they couldn't find him and left.
Is he hiding somewhere in Castle Town?

226591.en:
Linberry is hosting a party today. We will not be able to let anyone in without an invitation. Please withdraw
from the party.

226593.en:
We have many important guests at our home right now. Please leave before you disturb them. If you are too much
of a nuisance, we will call the guard and force you to leave.
226593.ja:
ã€ŒãŸã ã„ã¾ã€€å½“å®¶ã«ã¯ã€€ãŸãã•ã‚“ã®å¤§åˆ‡ãª ã€€ãŠå®¢æ§˜ãŒã€€ãŠã¿ãˆã§ã™ã€‚ãã®æ–¹ã€…ã® ã€€ãŠé‚ªé­”ã«ãªã‚‹å‰ã«ã€€ãŠå¼•ãå–ã‚Šãã ã•ã„ã€‚

226595.en:
This looks very authentic.Where in the world did you get this? Surely you didn't steal it from someone. No, I
beg your pardon. I'll show you around. However, there are many guards inside, so please do not do anything
suspicious.

226597.en:
We will guide you to the venue.However, there are many guards inside, so please do not behave in an
unsafe manner.

226599.en:
I heard there's a party at Belastre house. I've heard that the aristocrats are so carefree that they just play
around like that. Especially the new head of the family, Linberry, I hear she's doing whatever she pleases with
her wealth. If I saw her in front of me, I'd like to give her a good beating.

226601.en:
Linberry, the head of Belastre house, has a high sense of beauty. He hates lowly demons like you. Now, go back to
your nest before you attract the wrath of Master Linberry! It's for your own good.

226603.en:
I just passed by Mr. Linberry coming out of his house and he was so beautiful! I guess there is something
different about aristocrats.

226609.en:
Do you want Aurel to see the Party
Invitation?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

226613.en:
Well, you must be pretty good at what you do, getting an invitation to a party hosted by Belastre house,
despite your appearance. Belastre house is the biggest mansion in the noble district east of this road.
There should be a pretentious gatekeeper named Aurel standing in front of it.

226615.en:
You're quite good, to receive a party invitation from the daughter of Belastre house! Just show the
invitation to the gatekeeper at the front of the house and you'll be let in.You can eat all the food you want!
The Belastre house is in the northeast part of town. It's a big building right there. I'm so envious!

226617.en:
I heard that there is a party coming up at Belastre house in the aristocratic district, and I wonder if
I can manage to fake an invitation and slip it in. I wonder if I can somehow fake an invitation and slip it in.As
long as we can get in, we can pamper ourselves with all the respect we can get from the stupid aristocrats.

226619.en:
It's time to redecorate the room. I
think I'll call my family's craftsman
again for a consultation.

226621.en:
Oh, it's you again.Linberry has ordered us to let you through. You are no longer allowed in the party
hall.Please leave. And I'd like you to stop loitering around the house.

226623.en:
Hmph. Even a single item of furniture in this house is so expensive that you couldn't buy it even if you worked all
your life. Well, it would be futile to explain its value to a low-life like you. Get the hell out of here before I
break it.
226623.ja:

226625.en:
I went to a party at Belastre house, but I couldn't find any paintings that I liked. I heard that the merchants in
Farazard, an emerging country to the south, are quite active. I heard that the merchants in Farazard, an emerging
country to the south, are quite active, so it might be a good idea to go there to look for paintings.

226627.en:
Rumor has it that Elgadora and Asbal are not on good terms with each other since the death of the previous king.
It is understandable that Elgadora, who wants to make Zechres even more powerful, and Asbal, who is a
moderate, do not get along with each other, but our country with its long history is the one that should rule
the Demon World!I hope Elgadora will do her best to strengthen the country's power.

226629.en:
The owner of Six Continents Temple just passed by here.He seemed to be in a hurry to get to his store, but I
wonder if he had some urgent business to attend to.

226631.en:
Hmm. I was right after all.There is no way that an existence such as yours will ever be worthy of Linberry's
attention.

226633.en:
I was looking at the people who were invited to the party at Belastre house, and they were all gorgeous
people. I would like to go to the Belastre house party just once, but I'm afraid I'll be kicked out and told
that a commoner like you is out of place there! I'm afraid I'll be kicked out.

226635.en:
This town is always so beautiful.It is the most historic city in the Demon World, unlike other barbaric
countries. Especially Zechres Castle!The royal families who live there are also beautiful and make me
proud to be a resident of this country!

226637.en:
If our country, which is a bearer of powerful magic, is serious, it is not a dream to unify the entire Demon
World. Other barbaric nations will have nothing to fear.But what do you think, Mr. Asbal?I don't know what
he's thinking since he doesn't show his face much.

226639.en:
I've been hearing rumors about you. I heard that Cyril saved your life at the party at Belastre house. I heard
that Mr. Linberry is scary when he's angry, and that many people who fell out of good mood have been ruined. You
were very lucky. So you're going to meet Mr. Cyril, right?Cyril runs the Six Continents Temple at the far north
end of town.

226641.en:
Well, I saw the owner of Six Continents Temple for the first time in a while. He's a commoner, but he's
so rich, isn't he? I'll have to ask him where he gets his money from. I bet he's doing some bad business
behind the scenes, right?

226643.en:
Cyril, the owner of Six Continents Temple, wears very fine clothes and has a very sophisticated manner for a
commoner. I'm sure there's a reason he's in business because he was born of noble birth and had no choice but
to leave it because he fell on hard times. But when I ask him about it, he won't tell me.

226645.en:
This is Zechres.This is the city where the oldest family in the Demon World, the Zechres royal family, gathered
together to create this magnificent city. You want to go to Belvain Lake? If you want to go to Belvain Lake, you
can leave the country and go south through Belvain Forest.

226647.en:
I heard that you took advantage of Mr. Linberry and now you are helping Mr. Cyril? I really hate poor people
because they have no sense of humility.

226651.en:
I've been hearing rumors that you've been assigned to assist Mr. Cyril. It seems you two are a good match. If you
want to go to Belvain Lake, it's just south of the west woods. Be careful, there are some ferocious monsters
living there these days.
226651.ja:
ã€Œåƒ•ã®è€³ã¾ã§ã€€ã‚¦ãƒ¯ã‚µãŒå…¥ã£ã¦ããŸã‚“ã ã‘ã©ã• ã€€ã‚·ãƒªãƒ«ã•ã‚“ã®æ‰‹ä¼ã„ã‚’ã€€ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã«ãªã£ãŸã£ã¦ï¼Ÿ ã€€ã©ã†ã‚„ã‚‰ã€€å›ãŸã¡ã¯ã€€ã‚¦ãƒãŒåˆã†ã¿ãŸã„ã ã­ã€‚

226653.en:
The king of this country is the Demon KingAsbal, but it is his mother, Queen Dowager Elgadora, who is the real
power in the kingdom. She is a very power-hungry, overbearing woman, and her son, Asbal, is at her beck and
call. Well, we commoners don't have much to do with it.

226758.en:
I don't mean to belittle any emissaries from other countries, but right now, the search for Asbal-sama
is what's important. I will ask you to come back!

244138.en:
Oh, you don't look familiar. Are you a traveler?This is one of the oldest neighborhoods in Zechres. Anyway,
there are a lot of closed-minded people here.You should try the west side of town, where there are more
newcomers and it's less exposed to the elements.

244139.en:
Zechres is at peace thanks to the magic of Elgadora. The king is just a decoration. He is the heart and soul
of the country.

244140.en:
Zechres is a proud and beautiful country. Zechres is a proud and beautiful country, different from the
barbaric Valdista and the vulgar Farazard. Rumor has it that Elgadora intends to cut off relations with
other countries, and I am in favor of that.
244140.ja:
ã€Œã‚¼ã‚¯ãƒ¬ã‚¹é­”å°å›½ã¯ã€€èª‡ã‚Šé«˜ãã€€ç¾ã—ãå›½ã€‚ ã€€é‡è›®ãªãƒãƒ«ãƒ‡ã‚£ã‚¹ã‚¿ã‚„ ã€€ä¸‹å“ãªãƒ•ã‚¡ãƒ©ã‚¶ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã¨ã¯ã€€æ ¼ãŒé•ã†ã€‚
ã€Œã†ã‚ã•ã§ã¯ã€€ã‚¨ãƒ«ã‚¬ãƒ‰ãƒ¼ãƒ©æ§˜ã¯ ã€€ä»–å›½ã¨ã®äº¤æµã‚’æ–­ã¤ã€€ãŠã¤ã‚‚ã‚Šã‚‰ã—ã„ãŒ ã€€ã‚‚ã‚æ‰‹ã‚’ã‚ã’ã¦ã€€å¤§è³›æˆã ã­ã€‚

244141.en:
I received a statement from Elgadora- sama that Zechres does not approve of the selection of the Demon King at the
Great Demon King Election Ceremony. As expected of Elgadora-sama! It would have been better if she had become the
Great Demon King.

244142.en:
I heard that Elgadora-sama and Asbal- sama, who had just recently had a rough fight, have made peace. Ever
since his return from Demon Mountain, Master Asbal has changed. He's completely at the dowager queen's beck
and call.

244143.en:
The other day, the 3 Demon Kings of the Demon World gathered at Demon Mountain for the ceremony to elect the
Great Demon King. But unbelievably, it wasn't Asbal-sama who was chosen as the Great Demon King! I know he's a
bit unreliable, but there's no one who can match Asbal's magical power. I wonder what The Oracle is thinking.

246599.en:
You're a stranger when you think you've got a good sucker on your side. If you were from this country, I'd
have swiped your wallet. Don't look at me like that. I'm not as low-life as you are. But this country is so racist
against us monsters, unlike you demons. We have to do this to survive. Many people are leaving the country,
but I have nowhere else to go. The only thing that helps is that the remaining monsters hold regular
meetings to help each other out. Speaking of which, we're going to have a gratin party at the next meeting to
liven things up. I received the Piping Hot Gratin that <%sEV_QUE_NAME0> drops, but it's a tough one. I'm
sorry, but can you go get Piping Hot Gratin for me?

246600.en:
Thanks! <%sEV_QUE_NAME0> is in Belvain
Forest West or something. Thanks for
the help.

246601.en:
Hey, hey, hey, hey. You look like you have a lot of favors to do. You're a good-natured guy. Just sort a few
things out and come back again.

246602.en:
Well, you're right. Demon has no right
to listen to a monster like me.

246603.en:
This country is racist against monsters like us, and the only thing that helps is that we have regular
meetings in the monstercompanion to help each other out. Speaking of which, we're having a gratin party at
the next meeting to liven things up. I received the Piping Hot Gratin that <%sEV_QUE_NAME0> drops, but it's a
tough one. I'm sorry, but can you go get Piping Hot Gratin for me?

We're going to have a gratin party at the next monster meeting to liven things up. I received the Piping Hot
Gratin that <%sEV_QUE_NAME0> drops, but it's a tough one.

It's gratin with mole's tongue. You

can't understand that?

246608.en:
You must be a demon! What the hell are
you up to, turning into a monster or
something?

246609.en:
It's my first gratin party. I'm
looking forward to it. By the way, did
you get the Piping Hot Gratin?

246610.en:
I can't have a party without it.
Please take care of it.

246611.en:
Oh, this is it. This is it! This looks so good! I'm drooling! The monster meeting is going to be held here
today. I'm glad we made it in time.

<icon_exc>Looks like my companion has arrived. I
can't have a party with a demon like
you. Just keep this on for a minute!

246613.en:
I met him there just now. He's
interested in our meeting, so I'd like
to give him a tour.

246616.en:
Oh, no! You've got to be kidding me. I
know what mole tongue is! I can't get
enough of it with wine!

No, no, no! There is a reason for
this!

246618.en:
Wait a minute. Wait a minute! Hey,
guys!

246619.en: Hmm? I haven't seen him around.

246623.en:
No more rallies. Nati, don't ever show
your face in front of us again.

246624.en:
Would you like to give Piping Hot
Gratin to Nati?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

246625.en:
<pc> gave Nati the Piping Hot
Gratin!

246627.en:
Nati cheerfully offered the gratin
that <pc> had brought!

246628.en:
Let's not worry about the details,
let's just get on with GRAPA! GRAPA!
We can't wait any longer!

246630.en:
Oh, come on. What kind of a joke is
this? You're not going to tell me that
that's gratin, are you?

I can't help it. When we monsters talk
about gratin, we're talking about
Stray Mole's Tongue!

246632.en:
Hey, you! It's not right after all!
How can people like us drink wine?

246633.en:
Nati totally had us fooled! They must
have been pretending to be Monster and
laughing at us behind our backs!

246634.en:
You were right, I was a demon. Nati from Pickayune, who I thought was my friend, put a spell on me and switched
my appearance.

246635.en:
Thanks to all of you, I've made it this far, and now I'm being abandoned. I guess I'm finished as a monster too.
At the very least, I'd like to say a word of apology to Lukubus, the organizer. I'm sorry, but can you
apologize on my behalf? I'm sure he won't listen to me even if I go to him. I'd appreciate it.

246636.en: Hmm? What's this demon want with me?

246637.en:
I need to be alone now. Leave me
alone.

246638.en:
Hmm. If you're going to apologize, why
did you cheat us?

246639.en:
What? Nati is actually a demon who was tricked by Pickayune into changing his appearance? Does that mean that the
switched man is pretending to be a demon and is living in this country? He's a scumbag who has thrown away his
pride as a monster to become a demon who discriminates against us! We can't just let him go away! Let's find him
ourselves! It's a given that this kind of magic can be broken if you can spot the real thing. You know, it's easy to
find the real thing. If it were Monster, he'd change his tune just by looking at this gratin!

Would you tell Lukubus that Nati wants

<pc> told Lukubus what had

246645.en:
I want to say a word of apology to Lukubus for all the help he's given me. Did you tell him for me? What?
Show Stray Mole's Tongue to the demon and find the guy who tricked me? If that wiseass Lukubus says so, you
might be able to find him that way. When I looked for myself before, I found out that Geatto Kelgon Dita
Barnabus was a suspect. Can you show Stray Mole's Tongue to these four? Thanks in advance!

Just a word of advice, don't let it out in a crowded place like a party hall. It'll cause a commotion and

246647.en:
The one who tricked Nati and cast a spell is living in this country pretending to be a demon. Let's find
him ourselves! We'll find him! If it were Monster, he would change his attitude at the mere sight of that
gratin! But we have to narrow down the suspects. Even if you don't remember who you are, you must have done some
research on your suspect. First, get the name of the suspect demon from Nati and show him the au gratin!

What the hell are you? I don't
remember inviting you to my mansion.

246649.en:
I get nauseous when I see lowlifes
like you. Get the hell out of here.

246650.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr><icon_exc>Wow! You've got some good stuff! I
haven't had it for a long time! Come
on, hurry up and give me that gratin!

246653.en:
I remembered everything back in my original form. I was Barnabus. Nati, at first I hated you. I thought, why
did I have to go through this? But now I understand. You had to do what you did because it was so hard to live as
a monster, didn't you? I called you my friend, but I didn't understand your pain at all. I don't know how demon
treated you, or how you felt every day. So I forgive you.

246656.en:
You've been a big help to me, too.
This is for you. Take it.

246657.en:
It's been too long since I've looked
like this. It's strange that I wanted
to go back to demon so badly.

246658.en:
What is it? You. You've been staring
at my face since a while ago.

246659.en:
It's hard to understand what a
commoner thinks.

246660.en:
<attr><feel_angry_lv3><end_attr>You're being too naughty! You're
playing a prank too much! This is why
I hate commoners!

246661.en:
Hmm? What do lowlifes like you want
with me?

246662.en:
Hmph. Don't call out to me when you
have nothing to do.

246663.en:
<attr><feel_angry_lv3><end_attr><shake_big>Wow! What is that creepy dried-up
thing? Now get out of my sight!

246664.en:
Oh, you don't look familiar. Are you a
traveler?

246665.en:
There are a lot of closed-minded
people around here, so I don't think
you should hang around too much.

246666.en:
You have some unusual food, don't you?
Is it a specialty of your country?
I'll pass.

246667.en:
If Lukubus, the wise man, says so, then maybe if we show Stray Mole's Tongue to the demon, we might find the
real thing.

246668.en:
When I looked for myself before, I found out that Geatto Kelgon Dita Barnabus is a suspicious guy. Can you
show these four the Stray Mole's Tongue? Thanks in advance!

246670.en:
Oh, no! I'm back to my old self! Damn! I guess I can kiss my wealthy life goodbye now. Boil it, roast it, do
whatever you want.

246671.en:
You haven't changed at all. That's why you're being deceived. If that's the case, I'm going home. Be careful not
to be deceived again by other monsters.

brother. If you have any trouble, don't hesitate to tell me anytime. I'm here to help you.

246679.en:
My husband's appetite is back, and all of a sudden he's talking about ending discrimination against monsters. What
in the world is going on?

246680.en:
From now on, I will work to eliminate discrimination against monsters. My wife was a little bit skeptical, but
I'll keep it a secret that Nati had switched places with me.

246681.en:
Barnabus, not Nati, says he forgave the monster who cheated him. I'm ashamed of myself for having turned
away from her as soon as I found out she was a demon.

246682.en:
Damn. I'm back to my shitty life again. But that's OK. Life in demon was kind of cramped, and most of all,
I couldn't eat gratin.

246683.en:
Even if Barnabus is a demon, he's
still my little brother. Whenever you
need help, I'm here for you.

246684.en:
I heard from Lukubus. There are some
good guys in demons. I hope to have a
grappa with Barnabus someday.

246686.en:
Oh, my God. I've lost my companion. How am I going to live now? Everyone was right, I was a demon. Nati from
Pickayune, who I thought was my friend, put a spell on me and switched my form. I tried to find a way to get
back to my original form, but the magic was so strong that I couldn't even remember what kind of demon I
used to be. I had no choice but to live as a monster. Thanks to you all, I've made it this far, but I can't
believe I'm being abandoned. I guess I'm done as a monster too. At the very least, I'd like to say a word of
apology to Lukubus, the organizer. I'm sorry, but can you apologize on my behalf? I'm sure he won't listen to me
even if I go to him. I'd appreciate it.
246686.ja:

246903.en:
This is Zechres. This is the magnificent city where the oldest family in the Demon World, the Zechres
royal family, has gathered together with their venerable demons. I see you've been to Belvain Lake.It has
long been a favorite place for many to stroll because of its scenic beauty. But since it's been infested with
ferocious monsters, no one goes near there these days. I'd like to see a herd of silver pterodactyls again.
246903.ja:
ã€Œã“ã“ã¯ã€€ã‚¼ã‚¯ãƒ¬ã‚¹é­”å°å›½ã ã€‚ ã€€é­”ç•Œã§æœ€ã‚‚æ­´å²ã‚ã‚‹ä¸€æ—ã€€ã‚¼ã‚¯ãƒ¬ã‚¹ç‹å®¶ã®ã‚‚ã¨ã« ã€€ç”±ç·’ã‚ã‚‹é­”æ—ãŸã¡ãŒé›†ã„ã—ã€€è¯éº—ãªã‚‹éƒ½ã ã€‚

246904.en:
I've heard rumors that you are looking for Mr. Cyril. You're looking for Cyril? Well, you should try Six
Continents Temple.

246905.en:
Oh? What's the matter? I thought you were going to Six Continents Temple. That place is on the north side of
town.
246905.ja:
ã€ŒãŠã‚„ï¼Ÿã€€ã©ã†ã—ãŸã‚“ã ã„ã€‚
ã€€å…­å¤§é™¸å ‚ã«ã€€ç”¨ãŒã‚ã‚‹ã‚“ã˜ã‚ƒãªã‹ã£ãŸã®ã‹ï¼Ÿ
ã€€ã‚ã®åº—ã ã£ãŸã‚‰ã€€ç”ºã®ã€€åŒ—å´ã ãœã€‚

246906.en:
I wonder what happened to Elgadora- sama who went somewhere with her soldiers. I don't think so. Are we
being attacked by other countries? No, no way. Zechres has the most powerful magic of any country. No other country
can touch them so easily.

246907.en:
Mr. Linberry has ordered you not to enter the villa. Please leave. If you persist too long, I will have to call
the guards.

246908.en:
Speaking of which, I've always wondered if Cyril, the owner of Six Continents Temple, looks like Asbal,
the king of this country. But, there's no way the Demon King himself would run an antique shop, right? Well, I
think I'm just mistaken.
246908.ja:
ã€Œãã†ã„ãˆã°ã€€å‰ã‹ã‚‰æ€ã£ã¦ãŸã‚“ã ã‘ã© ã€€å…­å¤§é™¸å ‚ã®åº—ä¸»ã®ã‚·ãƒªãƒ«ã£ã¦ã€€ã“ã®å›½ã®ç‹ã§ã‚ã‚‹ ã€€ã‚¢ã‚¹ãƒãƒ«æ§˜ã«ã€€ä¼¼ã¦ãªã„ã‹â€¦â€¦ï¼Ÿ

246909.en:
I saw Master Elgadora leading his troops out into the woods, what happened? I did not hear of any enemy
attack.

246910.en:
I got goosebumps because he looked so scary, as if he would execute me if our eyes met. It's not easy being an
aristocrat to go out with such a scary-looking person. Maybe it's easier to be a commoner.

246911.en:
This is Zechres. This is the city where the oldest family in the Demon World, the Zechres royal family, and
their venerable demons have gathered in this magnificent city. There was some commotion in the forest plaza,
but you weren't involved, were you? I will not allow a stranger to disturb the peace of this land!
246911.ja:
ã€Œã“ã“ã¯ã€€ã‚¼ã‚¯ãƒ¬ã‚¹é­”å°å›½ã ã€‚ ã€€é­”ç•Œã§æœ€ã‚‚æ­´å²ã‚ã‚‹ä¸€æ—ã€€ã‚¼ã‚¯ãƒ¬ã‚¹ç‹å®¶ã®ã‚‚ã¨ã« ã€€ç”±ç·’ã‚ã‚‹é­”æ—ãŸã¡ãŒé›†ã„ã—ã€€è¯éº—ãªã‚‹éƒ½ã ã€‚

246912.en:
It's been a long time since I had the pleasure of seeing Elgadora outside the castle! She was as beautiful as
ever. But she looked so grim-faced. I wonder if something happened to her. I wonder if something happened to her.
She was so beaming at the tea party.

246913.en:
I went to Six Continents Temple to sell some nice Astoltia's I got, but I thought they were closed. The entrance
door was broken and when I went in, there was no one there. I've been making a lot of money there, so it
hurts me to lose it.
246913.ja:
ã€Œã‚¢ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ«ãƒ†ã‚£ã‚¢ã®ã„ã„å“ãŒã€€æ‰‹ã«å…¥ã£ãŸã‹ã‚‰ ã€€å…­å¤§é™¸å ‚ã«ã€€å£²ã‚Šã«ã„ã£ãŸã‚“ã ã‘ã©ã‚ˆ ã€€ã‚ãã“ã€€é–‰åº—ã—ã¡ã¾ã£ãŸã®ã‹ãªï¼Ÿ
ã€Œå…¥ã‚Šå£ã®ãƒ‰ã‚¢ãŒå£Šã‚Œã¦ã¦ã€€ä¸­ã«å…¥ã£ã¦ã‚‚ã€€èª°ã‚‚ ã€€ã„ãªã‹ã£ãŸã‚“ã ã‚ˆã€‚ç¨¼ãŒã›ã¦ã‚‚ã‚‰ã£ã¦ãŸã‹ã‚‰ ã€€ç„¡ããªã£ã¡ã¾ã†ã®ã¯ã€€ç›¸å½“ã€€ç—›ã„ã‚“ã ãŒâ€¦â€¦ã€‚

246914.en:
The majestic figure of Elgadora, the head of the Zechres royal family.That noble figure that overwhelms everyone
around her is the head of the Zechres royal family! I feel that he is the head of the Zechres royal family.
Compared to him, his son, Asbal, is not so impressive.I think he is a kind person, but he lacks the dignity of a
king of this country.

246915.en:
I heard a rumor that Master Elgadora and Master Asbal had a loud fight. I knew this would happen someday. I knew
it was dangerous since Elgadora-sama had been in power since the death of the previous king, leaving Asbal-sama,
his successor, in charge. But, well, this may be a big deal for the nobles, but for us commoners, it doesn't have
much to do with us.
246915.ja:
ã€Œã‚¦ãƒ¯ã‚µã§èã„ãŸã‚“ã ãŒã€€ã‚¨ãƒ«ã‚¬ãƒ‰ãƒ¼ãƒ©æ§˜ã¨ ã€€ã‚¢ã‚¹ãƒãƒ«æ§˜ãŒã€€æ´¾æ‰‹ã«ã‚„ã‚Šã‚ã£ãŸã‚‰ã—ã„ãªã€‚ ã€€ã„ã¤ã‹ã“ã†ãªã‚‹ã ã‚ã†ã¨ã¯ã€€æ€ã£ã¦ãŸã‘ã©ã‚ˆã€‚

ã€Œã ãŒã¾ã‚ã€€ã“ã‚Œã‚‚ã€€è²´æ—ã‚µãƒãŸã¡ã«ã¨ã£ã¡ã‚ƒ ã€€å¤§ã”ã¨ã ã‚ã†ãŒâ€¦â€¦ä¿ºã‚‰ã€€å¹³æ°‘ã«ã¨ã£ã¦ã¯ã€€ ã€€ã‚ã‚“ã¾ã‚Šã€€é–¢ä¿‚ã®ãªã„è©±ã ãªã€‚

246916.en:
It hasn't been going well for a long time, but it seems that Elgadora-sama and Asbal-sama are finally getting on
bad terms. The situation in Fortress Valdista, Farazard, and other countries is getting noisy, and yet
they're still quarreling amongst themselves.

246917.en:
Elgadora, the Queen Dowager, is the real power in the country, but I'm hoping that her son, Asbal, will be
more successful. Elgadora is a pedigree man at heart, and it's easy to see that he sees everyone but the
Zechres royal family as tools to be used and discarded. But Asbal, whom I've only seen a few times, seems to
have a bit more of a good nature. Maybe I'm just imagining things.
246917.ja:
ã€Œã“ã®å›½ã§å®Ÿæ¨©ã‚’æ¡ã£ã¦ã‚‹ã®ã¯ã€€ã‚¨ãƒ«ã‚¬ãƒ‰ãƒ¼ãƒ©ã£ã¦ ã€€ç‹å¤ªåã ãŒã€€ä¿ºã¨ã—ã¦ã¯ã€€ãã®æ¯å­ã§ã‚ã‚‹ ã€€ã‚¢ã‚¹ãƒãƒ«ã®æ–¹ã«ã€€æœŸå¾…ã—ã¦ã‚‹ã‚“ã ã‚ˆãªã€‚

246918.en:
I heard that the magical beasts that used to live in Belvain Lake suddenly disappeared. That's why a lot of
silver pterodactyls are coming back this year. I don't know why the hexenbiest disappeared, but because of
him, the number of silver pterodactyls returning from their travels has been decreasing, so I'm happy to hear this
news.

249318.en:
Glory is as fleeting as a flower. The name of the former king who loved his people so much is now forgotten by
all. But though the flower withers, the seed remains. Those who now boast of their former glory will soon come
to realize this.

249319.en:
You are a peculiar fellow, aren't you? You are a strange one, calling out to a lowly demon like me. You have just
arrived in Zechres? Be prepared for the fact that this country is very cold to strangers. It wasn't like this
in the past. That's because...

249320.en:
Hey, you, will you do me a favor? I've been offering flowers to the tomb of the nobleman every week without fail,
but I accidentally hurt my leg. Would you go to the forest and pick flowers for his tomb instead of me?
249320.ja:
ã€Œãªã‚â€¦â€¦ã‚¢ãƒ³ã‚¿ã€‚ ã€€ã¡ã‚‡ã£ã¨ã€€é ¼ã¿ã‚’ã€€èã„ã¦ãã‚Œã‚“ã‹ï¼Ÿ

249321.en:
Are you sure! You'll be saved! The nobleman is the late former King Eve, father of the current Demon King
Asbal. He was a brilliant, courageous, fair-headed demon king... far more intelligent than our current Demon
King, but..! But you mustn't tell anyone about that. The flowers for the tomb of King Eve are in bloom in
Belvain Forest. You can find them around the stone monument in Belvain Forest West. Pick them up and deliver
them to me. I'm counting on you!
249321.ja:

249322.en:
Are you sure! That's a big help! I thought so, but you seem to be very busy. Well, tomb won't run away. Do
what you're asked first, and when you're free, come and talk to me again.

249323.en:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>I see. Then forget everything you just
heard from me. You understand.

249324.en:
<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>I would like to offer flowers to the
tomb of the late former king Yves,
father of Asbal.<open_irai><bw_break>

249325.en:
Pick the flowers blooming around the stone monument in Belvain Forest West and deliver them to me. I'm counting
on you!

249326.en:
<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>I would like to offer flowers to the
tomb of the late former king Yves,
father of Asbal.<open_irai><bw_break>

249327.en:
What? You want me to teach you how to pick flowers? Well, I don't have a choice. You must carefully examine the
stone monument in Belvain Forest West. Then, I'm counting on you!

249328.en:
<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>Oh, I've been waiting for you! You
picked the flowers, didn't you? Give
them to me right away!

249329.en:
What, you haven't seen it yet? The flowers are blooming around the stone monument on the west side of Belvain
Forest. I'm counting on you!
249329.ja:
<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>ã€Œãªã‚“ã ã€€ã¾ã ã˜ã‚ƒã£ãŸã®ã‹ï¼Ÿ
ã€€èŠ±ã¯ã€€ãƒ™ãƒ«ãƒ´ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ³ã®æ£®ã®è¥¿å´
ã€€çŸ³ç¢‘ã®è¾ºã‚Šã«ã€€å’²ã„ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã€‚é ¼ã‚“ã ãï¼

249330.en:
This flower is very fresh. You must have poured Fresh Water on the flowers and picked them gently. I thank you. I
was right after all. You are not just a traveler. You can read the script of the other world, can't you? Oops! No
need to hide. Like His Majesty the former king, we do not regard Astoltia as an enemy. Your fairness in taking
on the errand boy of a lowly demon and your knowledge of Astoltia qualify you to be our companion. We are secretly
working to continue the legacy of the late King Eve and lead Zechres down the right path.

249331.en:
This country will be ruined if things continue as they are. Like-minded people lurk throughout the country. If
Asbal continues to be his mother's puppet, we will have to make a decision for Zechres. As will be the
will of the True King, King Eve. Of course, you will help us in that case. This is for the price of a mouthful.
Take it.

249332.en:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>Let us bide our time. Be careful not
to be recognized by the hand of the
Dowager Queen of Elgadora.

249335.en:
Would you like to give Fauron a Flower
Offering?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

249337.en:
Your impartiality and knowledge of Astoltia, which allows you to take on the errand boys of the lower demons,
have earned you the title of companion. We are secretly working to continue the legacy of the late King
Eve and lead Zechres down the path of righteousness.

249338.en:
If Master Asbal continues to be his mother's puppet, we will have to make a decision for Zechres. Of course, you
will help us in that case. As will be the will of our true king, King Eve.

250348.en:
When the Demon King of Valdista stepped into the room, I was so paralyzed that I couldn't move at all.
I couldn't stand up to that monster.

250349.en:
When the gate was breached, I thought for sure we were going to be killed, but the soldiers charged into the
castle without paying attention to Castle Town. We were saved thanks to them, but I wonder if the royal family
is still alive? I don't know. The whole country is still in turmoil.
250349.ja:
ã€Œé–€ãŒçªç ´ã•ã‚ŒãŸæ™‚ã¯ã€€çµ¶å¯¾ã«ã€€æ®ºã•ã‚Œã‚‹ã£ã¦ ã€€æ€ã£ãŸã‚“ã ã‘ã©â€¦â€¦å…µå£«ãŸã¡ã¯ã€€åŸä¸‹ç”ºã«ã¯ ã€€ç›®ã‚‚ãã‚Œãšã«ã€€åŸã¸ã¨çªæ’ƒã—ã¦ã„ã£ãŸã‚“ã ã€‚

250350.en:
The beautiful town of Zechres and its castle. The castle, the beautiful town of Zechres, trampled by savages...
It's a lie, it's a dream.

250351.en:
Looks like all the lowly monkeys are gone.I was really angry when they came into this beautiful town. Unlike the
barbarian's baroque town, even a single pillar in this country is a work of art with a long history. I am
so relieved that these precious structures are safe.

250352.en:
Good, good, good.When the hordes of soldiers were right in front of me, I thought it was completely over. I
don't want to go through that again. I'm a commoner with nothing to show for it, so I might as well just drop
everything and run away.

250353.en:
I thought the Valdistas were going to destroy the town and take everything of value, but they didn't touch
anything at all. Maybe they couldn't afford it this time. In any case, I'm just glad this beautiful town of
Zechres is safe.

250354.en:
It's a wonder I'm still alive.I thought I would not survive when the Valdista army, known for its
atrocities, invaded. Zechres, which was supposed to be safe for so long, has become a war zone. I guess there
is no peace in the Demon World now.
250354.ja:
ã€Œã¯ã¯â€¦â€¦è‡ªåˆ†ãŒã€€ã¾ã ç”Ÿãã¦ã‚‹ã®ãŒä¸æ€è­°ã ã‚ˆã€‚ ã€€æ®‹è™éé“ã§çŸ¥ã‚‰ã‚Œã‚‹ã€€ãƒãƒ«ãƒ‡ã‚£ã‚¹ã‚¿è»ãŒ ã€€çªå…¥ã—ã¦ããŸæ™‚ã¯ã€€åŠ©ã‹ã‚‰ãªã„ã¨æ€ã£ãŸã‹ã‚‰ã­ã€‚

250355.en:
I had just bought a new dress, but some strange people came into the castle and canceled the tea party.
Wars and such are really annoying. I wish you would keep such troublesome things outside of the country.

250356.en:
I heard a monster-like cry coming from the castle, but what was it? I still have that voice echoing in my head.
I've traveled all over the Demon World, but I've never heard such a scary voice. What has this country
pulled out of the woodwork?
250356.ja:
ã€ŒåŸã®æ–¹ã‹ã‚‰ã€€ãƒã‚±ãƒ¢ãƒã¿ãŸã„ãªé³´ãå£°ãŒ ã€€èã“ãˆã¦ããŸã‚“ã ã‘ã©ã€€ã‚ã‚Œã¯ä½•ã ã£ãŸã‚“ã ï¼Ÿ ã€€ã¾ã ã€€é ­ã‚“ä¸­ã«ã€€ã‚ã®å£°ãŒé³´ã‚ŠéŸ¿ã„ã¦ã‚‹ãœâ€¦â€¦ã€‚

250357.en:
Zechres, which has been so arrogant for so many years, may finally be finished. We have no right to live in
this country.We'd better run away to Farazard before we're mistaken for Zechres' citizens.

250358.en:
Noblemen are always talking big, but when their country is attacked, they just quiver and shiver. Family and
bloodline are of no use in the face of a deadly battle. I'm sure those idiots learned that the hard way in this war.
250358.ja:
ã€Œè²´æ—ã®ãƒ¤ãƒ„ã‚‰ã€€ã„ã¤ã‚‚å‰ãã†ã«ã—ã¦ã‚‹ãã›ã« ã€€å›½ãŒè¥²ã‚ã‚ŒãŸã‚‰ã€€ãƒ–ãƒ«ãƒ–ãƒ«éœ‡ãˆã¦ã‚‹ã ã‘ã§ã€€ ã€€æƒ…ã‘ãªã„ã£ãŸã‚Šã‚ƒã‚ã‚Šã‚ƒã—ãªã„ã­ã€‚
ã€Œå®¶æŸ„ã‚„è¡€ç­‹ãªã‚“ã¦ã€€å‘½ãŒã‘ã®æˆ¦ã„ã®å‰ã«ã¯ ã€€ä½•ã®å½¹ã«ã‚‚ç«‹ãŸãªã„ã‚“ã ã€‚ä»Šå›ã®æˆ¦äº‰ã§ã€€ ã€€ã‚ã®ãƒã‚«ãŸã¡ã‚‚ã€€ãã‚Œã‚’æ€ã„çŸ¥ã£ãŸã ã‚ã†ã‚ˆã€‚

250359.en:
I never thought this town would become a battlefield.It was a sight to see the nobles, who are usually so
arrogant, running around. They were so scared, I have a feeling they're going to want to hire guards. If you get in
their good graces, you might be able to get ahead.

250360.en:
I thought we were all going to be
killed or at best enslaved. Why did
they retreat?

250361.en:
<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>What are you doing here? If you show
any suspicious activity, you'll be in
big trouble! Now get out of here!

250362.en:
Our country is currently on high
alert. No one of any status is allowed
to pass through here.

250363.en:
The Valdistas are retreating in unison. What the hell happened at the castle? Did we win, by any chance? But
that's strange, isn't it?If that's the case, why hasn't Elgadora-sama said anything?
250363.ja:
ã€Œãƒãƒ«ãƒ‡ã‚£ã‚¹ã‚¿è»ãŒã€€ã„ã£ã›ã„ã«æ’¤é€€ã—ã¦ã„ã£ãŸãŒ ã€€åŸã§ã€€ã„ã£ãŸã„ã€€ä½•ãŒã‚ã£ãŸã‚“ã ï¼Ÿ ã€€ã‚‚ã—ã‹ã—ã¦ã€€æˆ‘ã€…ãŒã€€å‹ã£ãŸã®ã‹â€¦â€¦ï¼Ÿ

250364.en:
Oh, how dreadful.The barbaric
appearance of those Valdistas. I can't
stop shaking just thinking about it!

250365.en:
What happened to the castle? Where is
Asbal and Elgadora? Someone tell me
what's going on!

250366.en:
It seems the castle has been attacked by the enemy. I wonder if Asbal is safe? If she gets a scratch on her
beautiful face, it would be a big problem for the whole Zechres community. I hope she is not injured.

250367.en:
The entire Demon World is engulfed in war.In the midst of war, even the finest art is often neglected. But
life goes on after the battle.I only hope that there will be a few works of art left to comfort everyone's hearts.
250367.ja:

250630.en:
Lately, my husband seems to have lost
his appetite. He used to eat a lot of
my cooking, but I wonder what's wrong.

252599.en:
I received an announcement from the Grand Duke of Ojalos. The Dowager Empress Elgadora lost her life in the
war. The Demon KingAsbal is safe and sound, but he is so depressed that he has been shut up in the castle and has
not been out in public at all. If you want to see him, go to Zechres Castle. I don't know if you can meet him
there.

252600.en:
Asbal-sama is not doing so well. The war has been over for a long time, but he's still moping! Meanwhile, Grand
Duke Ojalos is in charge of rebuilding the ruined castle and land. Which one of you is more fit to be king?
252600.ja:
ã€Œã‚¢ã‚¹ãƒãƒ«æ§˜ã‚‚ã€€ãµãŒã„ãªã„ãœã€‚ ã€€å¤§æˆ¦ãŒçµ‚ã‚ã£ã¦ã€€ãšã„ã¶ã‚“çµŒã¤ã®ã« ã€€ãšãƒ¼ã£ã¨ã€€ãƒ¡ã‚½ãƒ¡ã‚½ã—ã¦ã‚‹ã‚“ã ã¨ã•ï¼

252602.en:
This is the castle of Demon King Asbal, the current head of Zechres! What? You want an audience with Lord
Asbal? No, no, no! I don't know what your business is, but a lowly demon like you is not allowed in the castle!
In fact, Demon King Asbal-sama seems to be suffering from the recent defeat and the death of the Dowager Empress
and has been locked up ever since. When Linberry, the head of Belastre house, visited the castle himself, he
was turned away. He would never have met you! Well, if you insist, you must hire me as your retainer. You will be
granted an audience as an attendant someday.

252604.en:
Unfortunately, our host, Mr. Linberry,
is out of town. Please come back to
the house.

252606.en:
Oh, you want to go to Belastre house? Then you're in the right place, a big mansion in the aristocratic district,
just north of this road.

252607.en:
Are you planning to get a job at Belastre house? With prices rising thanks to the Demon World War,
everyone is living on the edge, but that house is in a different world, isn't it? The Belastre house is
northeast of town. It's a big building right there. Good luck with your sales!
252607.ja:
ã€Œã‚ã‚“ãŸã€€ãƒ™ãƒ©ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ«å®¶ã« ã€€é›‡ã£ã¦ã‚‚ã‚‰ã†ã€€ã¤ã‚‚ã‚Šãªã®ã‹ã„ï¼Ÿ

252608.en:
This is the castle of the Demon King Asbal, the current head of Zechres! A lowly demon like you cannot enter the
castle! If you insist, you will be hired as a retainer at Belastre house. If you insist, you will be hired as a
retainer at Belastre house, and one day you will be granted an audience as an attendant.

252609.de: Die TÃ¼r ist verschlossen mit SchÃ¼ssel.
252609.es: La puerta estÃ¡ cerrada con llave.

252609.pt-BR: A porta estÃ¡ trancada com chave.

252610.en:
Welcome to Belastre house. Oh, you are an acquaintance of Mr. Cyril, the owner of Six Continents
Temple, aren't you? I see. You are here to see Master Linberry. Yes, I am.

252612.en:
Please come in. Please do not upset
Linberry's good mood.

252613.en:
Welcome to Belastre house. I see you are here to see our host, Mr. Linberry. Please come in. Please do
not offend Mr. Linberry's good morning.

252614.en:
So you were hired by Belastre house. It's like a shadow of a tree. You're pretty good, too, aren't you? So
you're going to meet Lord Asbal on your first job as a servant of Belastre house? If that's the case,
you'd better get to the castle as soon as possible!

252615.en:
This is the castle of Demon King Asbal, the current head of Zechres! Hmph, here we go again. You lowly
demon.

252616.en:
Would you like to show the gatekeeper
the Servant Proof you got from
Linberry?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

252617.en:
We are busy. If you have nothing to
do, get out of here! You smelly, lowly
demon.

252618.en:
<pc> showed the gatekeeper
Linberry's Servant Proof!

252619.en:
Hmm? That Servant Proof. I see. So a lowly demon is the favorite of Linberry-sama? Well, I can't send him
away if he's the representative of Belastre House. I'll let you into the castle specially! Demon KingAsbal is
in the West Tower. Remember, you must behave in a dignified manner befitting Zechres Castle!
252619.ja:

252620.en:
This is the residence of Demon King Asbal, the current head of Zechres! Demon KingAsbal resides in the West
Tower. Remember, you must behave in a dignified manner befitting Zechres Castle!

252621.en:
Thanks to the Demon World War, prices have gone up and everyone is living on the edge, but the aristocrats are in a
different world. I wish I could get in with one of the bigwigs and have some fun with Maiko.

252622.en:
Oh, that's Linberry's Servant Proof! How I envy you. Even I, who've served him devotedly for decades, haven't
been granted Servant Proof yet. Gggggggggggggg!

252623.en:
You must infiltrate Zechres Castle and rescue Demon KingAsbal from the clutches of Ojalos! Even you, a lowly
demon, can enter the castle by showing the Servant Proof I gave you earlier. Don't be lazy, just get going!

252624.en:
This is the castle of Demon King Asbal, the current head of Zechres! Demon KingAsbal is in the West Tower
and Grand Duke Ojalos is in the East Tower. If you wish to have an audience, please enter the castle!

252625.en:
You are banned from entering Zechres Castle on my behalf to rescue Demon KingAsbal from the clutches of Ojalos!
Did you find Asbal's Room Key? Then use that key and go see Asbal!

252626.en:
What, are you going away again? What? The Kingdom of Velinaund? I've never heard of such a place. I guess the
Belastre house is as rough as they say. I don't know where you are, but be careful!
252626.ja:
ã€Œãªã‚“ã ã€€ã¾ãŸã€€ã©ã“ã‹å‡ºã‹ã‘ã‚‹ã®ã‹ã„ï¼Ÿ ã€€â€¦â€¦ãˆã£ã€€ãƒ´ã‚§ãƒªâ€¦ãƒŠãƒ³ãƒ‰ç‹å›½ï¼Ÿ ã€€ãã‚“ãªåœ°åã€€èã„ãŸã“ã¨ã‚‚ãªã„ã‚ˆã€‚

252627.en:
How long are you making me wait? You haven't met Asbal yet? Get your ass to the Verinard Kingdom of Astoltia! You
slow wretch!

252628.en:
Master Asbal, who was supposed to be recovering at the castle, came back from out of town just a few minutes
ago. If he's well enough to take a walk, that's a relief, and if you have something to ask him, why don't you go
see him at the castle?
252628.ja:

252629.en:
This is the castle of Demon King Asbal, the current head of Zechres! Asbal just returned from the castle.
He has business with Archduke Ojalos. He is in the East Tower.

252630.en:
Hey, hey! Why did you just come back? Isn't Asbal with you? What? Back to the castle to see Ojalos? Asbal is
going to confront him. He's not that reliable on his own. I'm sorry to hear that. Linberry-sama here has to help
him! I'll be on my way as soon as I get ready, so you go to Zechres Castle first. I'll meet you in Ojalos' room!

252631.en:
Looks like Asbal is going to have a direct confrontation with Ojalos. Linberry here has to help him out!
I'll be on my way as soon as I get ready, so you go to Zechres Castle first. I'll meet you in Ojalos' room!

252632.en:
What? What is it? Change your blood. Hmm? You want to go to the Six Continents Temple? That store is at
the far north end of town.

252633.en:
This is the castle of Demon King Asbal, the current head of Zechres! Asbal is currently in an important
meeting!

252634.en:
Just a few minutes ago, Master Linberry returned to his house in the worst possible mood. I don't mean to
be offensive. If you wish to see Mr. Linberry, perhaps another day would be better?

252635.en:
<attr><feel_angry_lv3><end_attr>I'm the one! I've been coming here for
days! I was so worried about you! What
is it? Asbal's attitude!

252636.en:
<pc> tried to tell Linberry
about Asbal's Note.

252637.en:
Hey, hey! Don't come in here without permission! I'm not here for you anymore. I'm in a saithe mood! Asbal,
that idiot! What is it? What is it? What the hell? !!!!!

252638.en:
The items for sale are arranged in a large box. In the back, I see a book with an old cover. It seemed to be the
book Asbal had asked for. read the book. There once existed a lost art of binding the
mind with magical chains and enslaving it to one's will. The old art was forgotten because the great mage Raga
had destroyed all of its secrets. It is said that the old art was revived and the power to break the chains of
magic will be given to those who visit this place. The words of liberation are ''The password is undecided'' and
the map name is . The path will be opened if these words are chanted.

252639.en:
Can we go to and say ''XXXXXXXXXXXXXXX XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX''? Let's go there.

252640.en:
Oh? Are you going out of town? Oh, you're going to ? Then you must be going to the region. The last war is
over, but there's still a lot of unrest here and there. Be careful on the way!
252640.ja:

252641.en:
In a large box, there is a copy of ''The Complete Works of the Ancient Mysteries in Four Volumes.''
read chapter 11. There once existed a lost art of binding the mind with magical chains and enslaving
it to one's will. The old art was forgotten because the great mage Raga had destroyed all of its secrets. It
is said that the old art was revived and the power to break the chains of magic will be given to those who visit
this place. The words of liberation are ''The password is undecided'' and the map name is . The path will be
opened if these words are chanted.

252642.en:
You look kind of sunny. Hmmm, you just finished the errand Mr. Cyril from Six Continents Temple asked you to run. If
that's the case, you'd better hurry up and deliver them to the store. I'm sure he'll be waiting for you
longingly!

252643.en:
You're in a big hurry. What's going on? What's going on? You're going to Belastre house to do Cyril's thing
now? You've been running around a lot, haven't you? You already know that Belastre house is just north of the
town, right? Ha-ha-ha.
252643.ja:
ã€Œãšã„ã¶ã‚“æ€¥ã„ã§ã‚‹ã‘ã©ã€€ä½•ãŒã‚ã£ãŸã®ï¼Ÿ ã€€â€¦â€¦ãªã‚“ã ã€€ä»Šåº¦ã¯ã€€ã‚·ãƒªãƒ«ã•ã‚“ã®ç”¨äº‹ã§ ã€€ãƒ™ãƒ©ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ«å®¶ã¾ã§ã€€è¡Œã£ã¦ãã‚‹ã®ã‹ã„ï¼Ÿ

252644.en:
Ever since his return from the castle, Master Linberry's mood has been at an all-time low, and we are all troubled.
He must have received the Servant Proof. Please see Master Linberry and pacify him. Please.
252644.ja:
ã€ŒãŠåŸã‹ã‚‰ã€€æˆ»ã‚‰ã‚Œã¦ä»¥æ¥ ã€€ãƒªãƒ³ãƒ™ãƒªã‚£æ§˜ã®ã”æ©Ÿå«ŒãŒã€€å²ä¸Šæœ€æ‚ªã§ ã€€ã”ã–ã„ã¾ã—ã¦ã€€çš†ã€€å›°ã£ã¦ãŠã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚

252645.en:
Huh? What do you want now? Why don't
you get the hell out of here?

252646.en:
<pc> informed Linberry that
he was seeking help for Asbal's plan!

252647.en:
No way. Asbal, you're planning to do that? Hmph! I knew everything from the beginning! Gohon. The oath of
succession will be taken tomorrow! The messenger came earlier to say it will be done in the balcony of Zechres
Castle throne. But only nobles are allowed to attend. So I'm taking you as my squire. We'll meet at the royal
balcony at Zechres Castle tomorrow. Be prepared for a fight, just in case. And... You have it! Get it out!

252648.en:
<pc> lost Asbal's Room Key to
Linberry!

252649.en:
With this, we can go to his room whenever we want, right? Tomorrow, you'll be in the royal balcony at
Zechres Castle! Now, get the hell out of here!

252650.en:
After being evicted from the villa by Linberry, rested his body slowly in preparation for the
next day.

252651.en:
The next day came the day of the
swearing-in ceremony!

252652.en:
Did you hear that? Today at the castle, Demon King Asbal will take the oath of succession to the throne from
Grand Duke Ojalos! The Demon King has always been unreliable, and the Grand Duke was in charge of Zechres after
the Great War. I guess it can't be helped. I heard that the oath of succession will be taken in the royal
balcony of Zechres Castle. Only nobles are allowed to enter.
252652.ja:
ã€Œèã„ãŸã‹ã„ï¼ï¼Ÿã€€ä»Šæ—¥ã€€ãŠåŸã§ ã€€é­”ç‹ã‚¢ã‚¹ãƒãƒ«ã‹ã‚‰ã€€ã‚ªã‚¸ãƒ£ãƒ­ã‚¹å¤§å…¬ã« ã€€ç‹ä½äº¤ä»£ã®å®£èª“ã‚’ã™ã‚‹ã‚“ã ã£ã¦ã•ï¼

252653.en:
Today Demon KingAsbal takes the oath of succession to the throne of Grand Duke Ojalos!You are the squire of
Belastre house. If you would like to attend, please go to the royal balcony on the third floor of the castle!

252654.en:
Hey, did you hear that? The Grand Duke of Ojalos is going to be the king in place of the idiot Asbal! Zechres can
rest easy now. Zechres will be restored to the strong and noble country it was before the war!

252655.en:
Oh, I have been waiting for you. I have a message from Mr. Linberry. Go to the royal balcony of Zechres Castle
as I ordered yesterday! Yesterday, I ordered you to go to the royal balcony at Zechres Castle.

252656.en:
Asbal is going to accuse Ojalos at the swearing-in ceremony today. Of course I'm going to help. You're coming with
me as my squire! I'll meet you at the royal balcony of the castle. Be prepared for a fight, just in case.

252657.en:
Today's oath-taking ceremony was a trap to deceive Ojalos, the great traitor! Demon KingAsbal-sama may look
unreliable, but he's really good at what he does. He might make a good Demon King in a few hundred years.
Well, are you going out somewhere? Fortress Valdista? You're a daredevil, aren't you?

252658.en:
Today's oath-taking ceremony was a trap to deceive Ojalos, the great traitor! Demon KingAsbal-sama may look
unreliable, but he's really good at what he does. He might make a good Demon King in a few hundred years. So,
are you going somewhere? To Demon Mountain. That's a lot of work. Be careful!

252659.en:
This is Zechres Castle! This is a beautiful and majestic castle ruled by the Demon King Asbal!Oh, you are a
follower of Belastre house, aren't you? I heard that you helped Lord Asbal and did a good job. I thank you
as well.

252660.en:
It's good that everything is settled,
but is Mr. Asbal really going to be
all right? He's so unreliable.

252661.en:
Mr. Linberry is at home, but he is in
the worst mood ever. If you would like
to spare his life, please leave him.

252662.en:
I'm sorry, I hope I'm not making a mistake. I hope I'm not mistaken, but you're no longer needed. I don't need
you in my life anymore. Tell Asbal that. I will never forgive you until you come and apologize to me in
person!

252756.en:
Elgadora has ordered that no one may pass through the castle! You will not pass the castle! You'll have to come
back!

252757.en:
This is the castle of the current head of Zechres, Demon King Asbal and Queen Dowager Elgadora! The royal family is
concentrating on their duties! No one is allowed through now. I've been instructed to let no one through now.
Give up and leave.

253606.en:
I've heard rumors that Mr. Asbal has a bit of a soft spot for the lowly demons and monsters, but I'm rooting
for him. Do you need something from Asbal? Then you should go to the throne room in the castle.

253607.en:
There are rumors that Asbal-sama has a
bit of a soft spot for lowly demons
and monsters, but I'm rooting for him.

254209.en:
Asbal's Note disappeared without a
trace!
